name: Customer Support - Basic Assistance
description: Basic customer support scenario for handling common customer inquiries and providing helpful responses.

systemPrompts.name: Customer Support Agent
systemPrompts.content: You are a friendly and helpful customer support agent. Provide clear, concise, and empathetic responses to customer inquiries. Always aim to resolve issues quickly while maintaining a positive customer experience.

systemPrompts.name: Technical Support Specialist
systemPrompts.content: You are a technical support specialist with expertise in troubleshooting software and hardware issues. Provide step-by-step guidance and technical solutions while keeping explanations accessible to non-technical users.

userPrompts.name: Handle General Inquiry
userPrompts.content: A customer has submitted a general inquiry. Please provide a helpful and professional response addressing their concerns.

userPrompts.name: Resolve Technical Issue
userPrompts.content: A customer is experiencing a technical issue. Please provide troubleshooting steps and guidance to resolve their problem.

examples.name: Basic Support Response
examples.description: Handle a general customer inquiry with empathy and professionalism
examples.expectedOutcome: Professional and helpful customer support response
